title: Nueva: an alternative (TEFC)
brief_description: Shows and explains the approach of Nueva Day School and Learning Center, an alternative elementary school in Hillsborough, California. Describes clas activities at various age levels, involvement of parents in school activities and faculty educational research and development work.
